description: These dongers are so excited that they are clenching their fists or holding onto something with their grabby hands. There are so many hands to choose from. These dongers have hands made from characters like d and b, ෆු and ෆු , ლ , as well as tiny ૢ characters. title: Fists or Grabby Hands
